UniprotID	Q96FI4
Accession	Q96FI4;D3DW75;Q6ZRA7;Q86XW7;Q9H6C3
EntryName	NEIL1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Endonuclease 8-like 1 (EC 3.2.2.-) (EC 4.2.99.18) (DNA glycosylase/AP lyase Neil1) (DNA-(apurinic or apyrimidinic site) lyase Neil1) (Endonuclease VIII-like 1) (FPG1) (Nei homolog 1) (NEH1) (Nei-like protein 1)
GeneName	NEIL1
Length	390
Function	Involved in base excision repair of DNA damaged by oxidation or by mutagenic agents. Acts as a DNA glycosylase that recognizes and removes damaged bases. Has a preference for oxidized pyrimidines, such as thymine glycol, formamidopyrimidine (Fapy) and 5-hydroxyuracil. Has marginal activity towards 8-oxoguanine. Has AP (apurinic/apyrimidinic) lyase activity and introduces nicks in the DNA strand. Cleaves the DNA backbone by beta-delta elimination to generate a single-strand break at the site of the removed base with both 3'- and 5'-phosphates. Has DNA glycosylase/lyase activity towards mismatched uracil and thymine, in particular in U:C and T:C mismatches. Specifically binds 5-hydroxymethylcytosine (5hmC), suggesting that it acts as a specific reader of 5hmC.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Microtubule organizing center; Centrosome; Nucleus; Chromosome
Disorder	0.5707,0.6227,0.4369,0.3566,0.4017,0.4441,0.4256,0.3392,0.3599,0.3494,0.2918,0.2503,0.1298,0.1251,0.1251,0.0631,0.0372,0.0646,0.0631,0.0967,0.1092,0.0734,0.0662,0.1251,0.1881,0.1969,0.1942,0.1611,0.2715,0.1702,0.2064,0.2783,0.3426,0.4292,0.3286,0.3182,0.3215,0.3872,0.3494,0.3460,0.3215,0.3215,0.3948,0.3983,0.4119,0.3182,0.2918,0.2034,0.1942,0.1137,0.1942,0.2064,0.1424,0.1643,0.1914,0.2541,0.2680,0.3774,0.3910,0.4292,0.4441,0.4979,0.4186,0.3840,0.3053,0.2258,0.2002,0.2002,0.1702,0.2503,0.2951,0.2951,0.2715,0.3460,0.2094,0.2164,0.1671,0.1070,0.1070,0.0985,0.0985,0.1007,0.0494,0.0967,0.1115,0.1702,0.2034,0.3117,0.2292,0.3356,0.2224,0.1671,0.1823,0.1528,0.1791,0.3149,0.3053,0.4149,0.4864,0.3740,0.3494,0.2541,0.1583,0.1399,0.0817,0.0909,0.0518,0.0618,0.0618,0.0518,0.0543,0.1070,0.0948,0.0967,0.0704,0.0605,0.0531,0.0531,0.0218,0.0235,0.0473,0.0581,0.0948,0.1643,0.2918,0.2752,0.1942,0.2002,0.2094,0.2193,0.2399,0.2470,0.2575,0.2575,0.2436,0.3321,0.3426,0.2715,0.1914,0.3019,0.3053,0.2002,0.1731,0.1881,0.1823,0.1373,0.1229,0.1881,0.2645,0.2849,0.1914,0.1881,0.1881,0.1554,0.1791,0.1184,0.1206,0.1162,0.1643,0.1424,0.0749,0.0749,0.1229,0.0851,0.0799,0.0870,0.0581,0.0704,0.0618,0.0543,0.0473,0.0483,0.0531,0.0281,0.0320,0.0327,0.0543,0.0300,0.0334,0.0414,0.0424,0.0909,0.0835,0.0704,0.1184,0.1137,0.0719,0.0780,0.1298,0.1162,0.0851,0.0870,0.1476,0.2193,0.3087,0.3426,0.4186,0.4507,0.5493,0.4330,0.4119,0.4409,0.4292,0.4409,0.4652,0.3910,0.3872,0.4619,0.5456,0.4619,0.4979,0.6089,0.6322,0.6322,0.5419,0.4725,0.4476,0.3807,0.2680,0.2715,0.3460,0.2849,0.3910,0.3948,0.3910,0.3356,0.3566,0.3740,0.3019,0.3053,0.3840,0.3740,0.3667,0.2609,0.2541,0.3215,0.3948,0.3872,0.4619,0.5665,0.5620,0.5758,0.5419,0.4864,0.4685,0.3774,0.4330,0.4766,0.3631,0.3704,0.3704,0.2884,0.2129,0.2164,0.2783,0.3053,0.3117,0.2918,0.2951,0.2884,0.2258,0.2364,0.2328,0.3215,0.3566,0.3774,0.4725,0.4766,0.4292,0.4369,0.4149,0.4292,0.5211,0.6269,0.6576,0.6906,0.6851,0.6089,0.6136,0.6576,0.6576,0.7415,0.7289,0.7209,0.7
